snippet: Soldiers blocked roads, fired shots into the air and burned several buses on Friday after a fellow soldier was killed in a bus accident, officials said.
abstract: Nigerian soldiers block roads, fire shots into the air and burn several buses in Lagos after a fellow soldier was killed in a bus accident.
lead_paragraph: Soldiers blocked roads, fired shots into the air and burned several buses on Friday after a fellow soldier was killed in a bus accident, officials said.

headline.main: Nigeria: Enraged Soldiers Riot in Lagos
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Enraged Soldiers Riot in Lagos
